subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
From hand {{zh-l|*殳}} and a person squatting {{zh-l|*尸}} and remnant {{zh-l|*共}} (a man sitting his butt in on a stool) (now {{zh-l|*臀}}). Original meaning “[[buttocks]]”. Later meaning “a [[hall]]”.
